評論.評論: Shipped with only one DIMM, which isn't ideal for performance. On the flipside, this meant by buying a second DIMM, I was doubling the memory to 32GB, which is nice. Keep in mind if you install Windows, you'll need to pay for your own Windows license. Monitor mount works, but doesn't prevent accidental removal if bumped.
